ads.author: John DeMartini
ads.title: Williams Pinbot Pinball Machine
ads.description:
Up for sale is a Williams Pinbot Pinball Machine.  Manufactured in 1986/1987, this is a space-themed pinball with simple rules. Key shots include the ramp, drop targets, and a vortex ramp. Also has multi-ball.

Overall, this machine is in great shape with only normal signs of use. 
Playfield looks beautiful and backglass  is in wonderful shape. Machine has been recently serviced with new bumper rubbers, lights replaced with cooler and lower wattage #47 bulbs. It is fully cleaned, working 100% and ready to go.  

Also, the battery board has been replaced with a remote battery pack, so no more worrying about leaky batteries destroying the CPU.  In addition, the notorious unprotected bridge rectifier issue has been fixed with new fuse systems installed for added protection. Will come with original service manual.  

If interested please contact me. Pickup in the Brandon / Valrico area or buyer arranges freight.

Please don't just ask if it is available and not follow up. If ad is up then it is available. I will likely ignore just \

ads.author: Max Johnson
ads.title: WANTED: FIRE! pinball machine
ads.description: I am re-starting a program where I place a FIRE! pinball machine in a fire station on $.50 per play.  At the end of the month, I count the quarters, match the amount, and then donate it to the charity of the stations choice.  The game gives the guys something to do when they arent working, and the proceeds help others.  I did this many years ago and it was a very successful event.  I rotate the game into another fire station every 60 days.  I need two or three more machines (FIRE!) due to the sheer number of fire stations there are.  I cant pay top dollar because this is for non profit.  I restore each of these games before they are placed so that they look good and are less likely to fail.  I of course pay for all the repairs.  There is NO cost to the firefighters, other than paying fifty cents (or donating $.50) to a charity.   If you know of anyone who has a FIRE! pinball and would like it to go to a very good cause, let me know.

ads.author: Brandon Grieve
ads.title: Stern Stranger Things Pinball
ads.description:
FOR SALE: Stern Stranger Things Pro — HUO • Only 559 Plays • Loaded With Extras!

Official Stern Topper, Shooter Rod, Armor, Inner Art Blades, UV Kits Included

Like-New • First Owner • Latest Code Installed

Offering my Stranger Things Pro in like-new condition. I’m the original owner, and this game has lived its entire life in a climate-controlled, non-smoking home. It plays perfectly, looks fantastic, and includes some of the hardest-to-find accessories already installed.

Only 559 total plays, updated to the latest Stern code, and presents exactly as a HUO collector-quality machine should.

Condition

Home Use Only — First Owner

Only 559 total plays

Like new inside and out

Latest code installed

No mechanical issues

Cabinet, playfield, ramps, targets, screens, and mechs all look and function perfectly

This is a clean, collector-level example.

Included + Installed Upgrades

These official Stern accessories are already pre-installed and ready to enjoy:

Official Stern Stranger Things Topper

Official Stern Shooter Rod

Official Stern Cabinet Armor Set

These add tremendous value and visual impact.

Included but Not Yet Installed (Brand new in box)

Stranger Things Inner Art Blades

UV Light Kit(s)

These are some of the most desirable Stranger Things accessories — especially the UV kit for the hidden/invisible ink playfield effects.

Pickup / Shipping

Easy ground-level pickup

Willing to coordinate shipping via STI/Beltmann, Fast Eddie, or your preferred transporter

Price

Asking $7,000
Open to reasonable offers. Willing to consider trades for Avatar CE, Monster Bash LE, Elvira's HOH (40th Anniversary or Blood Red Kiss Edition), Willy Wonka CE, and Wizard of Oz Yellow Brick Road Edition only. But they must be in new or like-new condition. I'm not interested in other trades. Please don't ask. And yes, I realize that I'd have to add cash to the trade.
